items.content_html: Chat-Super is a lightweight, hassle-free chat application that lets you connect with others instantly without the need for sign-ups or accounts. Built with Next.js, Socket.io, and Tailwind CSS, this app is perfect for private conversations and collaborative chats.

Built with Next.js, Socket.io, and Tailwind CSS, this app is perfect for private conversations and collaborative chats.
